pages.text: $(item)Milk Bottle$() is a Dairy Food item. It can be obtained from $(thing)Cows$() or $(thing)Mooshrooms$() by interacting with an empty $(item)Bottle$(). But drinking Milk Bottle will not have any effects. $(br2)$(item)Milk Bottle$() has a dairy value of 1 in the $(pot)Crock Pot$() recipes.
